name: Crafting Dead
description: Crafting Dead is a multiplayer based survival game with a voxel theme. Aim high and punch low, survive at all costs! Psst, bring a friend. They can help carry gear.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 32-Bit Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 750 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 6 GB available space Additional Notes: Recommend Low Quality Settings
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 64-Bit Processor: 3 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 760 DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 10 GB available space Additional Notes: Recommend High Quality Settings
